class txExtendedTimer

#include "txtimer.h" 

            defined by second timer

Public Interface
txExtendedTimer txExtendedTimer ~txExtendedTimer
timer context remainder
timersToExpire reset

Public Interface

txExtendedTimer( ) ;
txExtendedTimer( TX_TIMER_FUNC func , void* context , unsigned long interval ) ;
~txExtendedTimer( ) ;
const txTimer* timer( ) const;
void* context( ) const;
unsigned long remainder( ) const;
unsigned long timersToExpire( ) const;
void reset( TX_TIMER_FUNC f = 0 , void* c = 0 , unsigned long i = 0 ) ;

class txTimer

#include "txtimer.h" 

        defined by milli-second timer

Public Interface
txTimer txTimer ~txTimer
expiryTime status context
interval trigger clear
reset getMinWaitTime processAndGetMinWait
processExpiredTimers currentTimeZone currentTime
currentTimeZone currentTime setTimeZone
setTimeOfDay

Public Interface

txTimer( ) ;
txTimer( TX_TIMER_FUNC func , void* context , unsigned long interval ) ;
~txTimer( ) ;
double expiryTime( ) const;
txTimerEnum::STATUS status( ) const;
void* context( ) const;
unsigned long interval( ) const;
void trigger( double now ) ;
void clear( ) ;
void reset( TX_TIMER_FUNC func = 0 , void* context = 0 , unsigned long interval = 0 ) ;
static long getMinWaitTime( ) ;
static long processAndGetMinWait( ) ;
static void processExpiredTimers( ) ;
static int currentTimeZone( ) ;
static double currentTime( ) ;
static void currentTimeZone( int& mw , int& dst ) ;
static void currentTime( unsigned long& s , unsigned long& ms ) ;
static void setTimeZone( int mw , int dst = 0 ) ;
static void setTimeOfDay( unsigned long sec , unsigned long ms ) ;
